bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with pi yin 癖飲 , aggregation-illness rheum. Ben cao tu jing 本草圖經 Substance Entry yuan hua 芫花 quoting Hu Qia 胡洽：胡洽治水腫及支飲、澼飲，加大黃、甘草並 煎，五物各一兩，棗十枚，同煮如法 , “Hu Qia’s treatment of water swelling and propping rheum, as well as flushing rheum . Add da huang and gan cao , and fry together. All five items in the amount of 1 liang . Boil together with ten pieces of zao . Proceed according to the established pattern”.
